Context:
George Brown College offers programs in the Hospitality and Tourism sector with a focus on providing students with real industry experience through field education placements. They have recently introduced a common first year for students enrolled in one-year certificate program and two-year diploma programs, allowing students to explore various disciplines before deciding on an area of specialization. The college also provides an Entry Advising service to help match skills, background, and career goals with program options, and offers information sessions for prospective students.

The contact details for the college are:
Phone number: 416-415-2000
TTY: 1-877-515-5559
Email address: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

George Brown College provides specially-designed, award-winning facilities for Hospitality studies and offers virtual meetings with recruitment representatives specializing by country of origin. The college also acknowledges the land they are located on.

For students who already have a diploma, there is an option to fast track into the 3rd year of the Hospitality degree program. Applications deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more can be kept up-to-date by signing up for notifications.

The information contained in this website is subject to change without notice. It should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying the information with the college directly.
